text: Dato' Eddin Syazlee bin Shith (2 January 1974 â€“ 20 September 2024) was a Malaysian politician. He served as Deputy Minister in the Prime Minister's Department for Economic Affairs in the Barisan Nasional (BN) government from August 2021 to November 2022. He was also Deputy Minister of Works in the Perikatan Nasional (PN) government from July 2020 to August 2021, and Deputy Minister of Communications and Multimedia in the Pakatan Harapan (PH) government under Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad from July 2018 to February 2020. Eddin was the Member of Parliament for Kuala Pilah from May 2018 to November 2022. He was a member of the Malaysian United Indigenous Party (BERSATU) and held important roles in PN and BERSATU in Negeri Sembilan until his death in September 2024. Category:Malaysian politicians
title: Eddin Syazlee Shith
